snippet: The game’s complexities can obscure a player’s favored shooting hand, but players, coaches and general managers realize how crucial it can be.
abstract: Slap Shot column; hockey's complexities can obscure a player's favored shooting hand, but players, coaches and general managers realize how crucial it can be.

byline.original: By JEFF Z. KLEIN and STU HACKEL

lead_paragraph: The game’s complexities can obscure a player’s favored shooting hand, but players, coaches and general managers realize how crucial it can be.

headline.main: Setting a Hockey Team’s Direction Left and Right
